queries.query:
from(bucket: "Inversor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Huawei")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_power_kW" or r["_field"] == "powermeter_kW")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.active_power_kW - r.powermeter_kW }))

colors.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

queries.query:
from(bucket: "Inversor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Huawei")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_power_kW" or r["_field"] == "powermeter_kW")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.active_power_kW - r.powermeter_kW }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "consumption" }))
  |> yield(name: "calculated")

queries.query:
from(bucket: "Inversor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Huawei")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "inverter_efficiency")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Inversor")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Huawei")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "day_active_power_peak_kW")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
